description: Ghostly apparitions that haunt the Haunted Mill, their forms flickering and shifting, their moans and wails echoing through the dilapidated structure.

attacks.attackDescription: The spectre reaches out with its chilling, incorporeal hand, draining the very life force of its victim.
The spectre unleashes a bone-chilling wail, causing the target to feel the unrelenting anguish of the lost souls trapped within.
